name: KPBS
0:
”Alexa, ask KPBS to play Live”
”Alexa, ask KPBS to play Morning Edition”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: k. p. b. s.
des:
Listen to KPBS streaming radio and show archives on Alexa enabled devices. More information is available at www.kpbs.org.

To play the KPBS live stream, just say:
 -"Alexa, ask KPBS to play Live".

To play a KPBS show archive, just say: "Alexa, ask KPBS to play 'Morning Edition'".
You can select from many of KPBS's show archives including:
 - '1A'
 - 'A Way With Words'
 - 'All Things Considered'
 - 'Fresh Air'
 - 'Hidden Brain'
 - 'Latino USA'
 - 'Marketplace'
 - 'Morning Edition'
 - 'Reveal'
 - 'Snap Judgment'
 - 'TED Radio Hour'
 - 'The California Report'
 - 'The World'
 - 'This American Life'
 - 'Throughline'
 - 'Travel with Rick Steves'
 - 'Weekend Edition Saturday'
 - 'Weekend Edition Sunday'.

At anytime you can stop the radio by saying "Alexa, stop".

Other commands include 'Pause', 'Stop', 'Resume', 'Next' and 'Previous'.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
